If you're that worried,"},{"lineNumber":143756,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この子、貴方のところに置いてやって下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"please keep this child with you.\""},{"lineNumber":143757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、愛？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-Ai?\""},{"lineNumber":143758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……私はもういらない、か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Am I no longer needed?\""},{"lineNumber":143759,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿ね、そんなわけないでしょ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool, of course that's not true.\""},{"lineNumber":143760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「人類軍と魔軍の戦いにおいて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In the battle between the human army and the demon army,"},{"lineNumber":143761,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス殿のいる場所が常に最前線」","translatedEnglishLine":"the place where Lord Rance is, is always the front line.\""},{"lineNumber":143762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なら、貴方の力は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, I thought your strength would be"},{"lineNumber":143763,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこで使った方がいいと思ったからよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"better used there.\""},{"lineNumber":143764,"originalJapaneseLine":"（まあ、この男の言うことならちゃんと聞くし、","translatedEnglishLine":"(Well, since he listens properly to what this man says,"},{"lineNumber":143765,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この男も謙信を使い捨てるようなことは","translatedEnglishLine":"and this man wouldn't just throw Kenshin away,"},{"lineNumber":143766,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ないだろうと考えたからでもある……）","translatedEnglishLine":"that's also why I thought so...)"},{"lineNumber":143767,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……けど、ちょっと腹が立つわね）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...But it does make me a little mad.)"},{"lineNumber":143768,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……愛？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ai?\""},{"lineNumber":143769,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こほん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahem.\""},{"lineNumber":143770,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この地を守る任務なら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If the mission is to defend this land,"},{"lineNumber":143771,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私と勝虎で上杉軍を率いて","translatedEnglishLine":"Katsutora and I will lead the Uesugi army,"},{"lineNumber":143772,"originalJapaneseLine":"　継続しますのでご安心を」","translatedEnglishLine":"and continue it, so please rest assured.\""},{"lineNumber":143773,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……だが、私は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...However, I\""},{"lineNumber":143774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":143775,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、やはり同行させて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I still want to accompany you.\""},{"lineNumber":143776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回のことで自分の力不足を痛感しました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This time, I keenly realized my own lack of strength.\""},{"lineNumber":143777,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信は真っ直ぐ、憧れの人を見据えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin looked straight at the person she admired."},{"lineNumber":143778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は貴方の下で学び、今よりも強くなりたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I want to learn under you and become stronger than I am now.\""},{"lineNumber":143779,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……これ以上強くなるって）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...Become even stronger?)"},{"lineNumber":143780,"originalJapaneseLine":"（今の時点で目茶苦茶強いのに……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Even though she's ridiculously strong already...)"},
 
{"lineNumber":143781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、よかろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, very well.\""},{"lineNumber":143782,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これから宜しくな、謙信」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I look forward to working with you from now on, Kenshin.\""},{"lineNumber":143783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{"lineNumber":143784,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see."},{"lineNumber":143785,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃあ頑張れよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, do your best.\""},{"lineNumber":143786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、いずれまた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, until next time.\""},{"lineNumber":143787,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは謙信達と別れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance parted ways with Kenshin and the others."},{"lineNumber":143788,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がバボラの陣地目指し進む途中、","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way as Rance and company headed toward Babora's camp,"},{"lineNumber":143789,"originalJapaneseLine":"食事休憩を取っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"they took a meal break."},{"lineNumber":143790,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しっかし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Still...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうですか。
なら、あの部隊が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that's the case, that unit

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 民を傷つけることはもうないのですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: won't be harming civilians anymore, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「良かった……」
「ありがとうございます、ランス殿……」
「うむ」
「申し訳ない思いです……
貴方にここまで迷惑をかけるとは……
「ま、これに懲りたら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if you've learned your lesson from this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あまり無理はせんことだ」
「と、謙信に言っても無駄か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Though, saying that to Kenshin would be useless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 愛、お前が無理をさせるな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai, don't let him overdo it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無茶です。
上杉謙信とはこういう方なので」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is just how Uesugi Kenshin is."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……そうですね。そんなに心配なら、
この子、貴方のところに置いてやって下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please keep this child with you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……私はもういらない、か？」
「馬鹿ね、そんなわけないでしょ」
「人類軍と魔軍の戦いにおいて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the battle between the human army and the demon army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿のいる場所が常に最前線」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the place where Lord Rance is, is always the front line."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なら、貴方の力は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, I thought your strength would be

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで使った方がいいと思ったからよ」
（まあ、この男の言うことならちゃんと聞くし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Well, since he listens properly to what this man says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この男も謙信を使い捨てるようなことは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and this man wouldn't just throw Kenshin away,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ないだろうと考えたからでもある……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's also why I thought so...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……けど、ちょっと腹が立つわね）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...But it does make me a little mad.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こほん」
「この地を守る任務なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If the mission is to defend this land,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私と勝虎で上杉軍を率いて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katsutora and I will lead the Uesugi army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 継続しますのでご安心を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and continue it, so please rest assured."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……だが、私は」
「いえ、やはり同行させて下さい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I still want to accompany you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今回のことで自分の力不足を痛感しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time, I keenly realized my own lack of strength."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信は真っ直ぐ、憧れの人を見据えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin looked straight at the person she admired.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は貴方の下で学び、今よりも強くなりたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I want to learn under you and become stronger than I am now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……これ以上強くなるって）
（今の時点で目茶苦茶強いのに……）
「がははは、よかろう」
「これから宜しくな、謙信」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I look forward to working with you from now on, Kenshin."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいっ」
「そか。
じゃあ頑張れよ」
「はい、いずれまた」
ランスは謙信達と別れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance parted ways with Kenshin and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がバボラの陣地目指し進む途中、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way as Rance and company headed toward Babora's camp,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食事休憩を取っていた。
「しっかし……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
